item.title: Std_string
item.description: std::string 与 char[] 的相互转化 #include <iostream> #include <cstring> int main() { // std::string -> char[] std::string cpp; char c[10] = "hello, c"; cpp = c; std::cout << cpp << std::endl; // hello, c // char[] -> std::string char c1[10] = {0}; std::string cpp1 = "hello, cpp"; strcpy(c1,cpp1.c_str()); std::cout << c1 << std::endl; // hello, cpp return 0; } std::string 与 char[] 的清空 st
